titleStmt.title: The Account examined, or, A vindication of Dr. Arthur Bury, Rector of Exeter College, from the calumnies of a late pamphlet, entituled, An account of the proceedings of the Right Reverend Father in God, Jonathan, Lord Bishop of Exon, in his late visitation of Exeter College in Oxon

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Randall Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: The visitation of the bishop was occasioned by the expulsion appeal of James Colmer, the publication by Dr. Bury entitled Naked Gospel, and other alledged irregularities at Exeter.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
